name: Snake Game (ImMoRTaL(Cool_Guy))
description:
Hi there!!

I just finished uploading my third game which is snake game, I think you would like it a lot as there are a lot of features in this game.

In Case you didn't knew the rules :-

1) You will need to eat the food which will be a red dot 

2) When you touch that you will grow

3) If you touch the border or yourself the game will end right away
